name: last scheduled post time
author: wp-hotline.com ~ Stefan

sections.description: Shows the date & time of the last scheduled post in the publish box. Also comes with a shortcode [next-scheduled-post] to show the next schedlued post in your theme.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins screen in WordPress
  3. go edit an already published post
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins screen in WordPress
  3. go edit an already published post

short_description: Shows the date & time of the last scheduled post in the publish box + shortcode [next-scheduled-post] for your theme.
description: Shows the date & time of the last scheduled post in the publish box. Also comes with a shortcode [next-scheduled-post] to show the next schedlued post in your theme.
